locale.name: controls.licensekey.template.info
locale.en: You can expand the functionality of QUIQQER with premium packages. To install premium packages you need a valid license key. You will receive your license key when you purchase a premium package in the QUIQQER Store.

locale.name: quiqqer.auth.login.password.message
locale.en: If you have forgotten your password, please enter your email address here and click on' Reset password'. You will receive an e-mail with further instructions.

locale.name: mail.auth.password_reset_confirm.body
locale.en:
Hello [username],

You requested a reset of your login password on [date]. In order to be able to set a new password, a login password will be sent to you with which you can log in. Please confirm this process by calling the following link:

[confirmLink]

Hint: If you did not request a reset of your login password, you can simply ignore this email.

locale.name: exception.user.auth.handler.verification_package_not_installed
locale.en: Confirmation mail for "Password reset" cannot be sent because the package "quiqqer/verification" is not installed or not installed in the required version (^3).

locale.name: exception.user.auth.handler.missing_user_email
locale.en: Confirmation mail for "Password reset" cannot be sent because the user has no e-mail address.

locale.name: mail.auth.password_reset_newpassword.body
locale.en:
Hello [username],

You have requested the reset of your password. You can log in with the following password.

Login password: [newPassword]

locale.name: exception.user.auth.send_password_reset_mail_error
locale.en: The process "Reset Password" encountered an unexpected error. Please try again later.

locale.name: users.auth.passwordresetverification.success
locale.en: Resetting your password has been successfully verified. You will receive an e-mail with a new login password.

locale.name: users.auth.passwordresetverification.error
locale.en: Unfortunately, resetting your password did not work. Please try again or try again later.

locale.name: quiqqer.settings.security_headers.hsts.description
locale.en: HTTP Strict Transport Security (HSTS) is a security mechanism for HTTPS connections designed to protect against both downgrade attack and session hijacking.

locale.name: quiqqer.settings.security_headers.hsts.max_age.description
locale.en: max-age is the amount of time in seconds that a browser should cache the HSTS rule.

locale.name: quiqqer.settings.security_headers.hsts.subdomains.description
locale.en: Optionally, the HSTS parameters can be extended to all subdomains.

locale.name: quiqqer.settings.security_headers.hsts.preload.description
locale.en: This list is distributed with the browser so that it uses HTTPS for the initial request to the listed sites as well.

locale.name: quiqqer.settings.general.globals.timezone.description
locale.en:
This setting affects all time and dates

You can find a complete list of all timezones at: http://php.net/manual/en/timezones.php

locale.name: quiqqer.settings.date_formats.description
locale.en:
Einstellungen und oder mögliche Datumsformate finden Sie unter:

http://php.net/manual/en/function.strftime.php#refsect1-function.strftime-parameters

locale.name: quiqqer.settings.email.smtp.auth.MAILFromText.description
locale.en: Name of the sender displayed to the recipient.

locale.name: quiqqer.settings.email.queue.desc
locale.en: E-mails are saved in a queue until it is certain that they were sent.

locale.name: quiqqer.settings.email.queueLimitPerHour
locale.en: Max number of mails per hour

locale.name: quiqqer.settings.email.queueLimitPerHour.desc
locale.en: Specifies the maximum number of e-mails that can be sent within one hour. 0 = no limit.

locale.name: message.ajax.licenseKey.upload.error
locale.en: An error ocurred while reading the license key file. The license key file may be invalid. Please contact an administrator or the issuer of the license key.

locale.name: message.ajax.licenseKey.upload.success
locale.en: The license key file has been imported succesfully. This QUIQQER system now has access to all packages this license key contains.

locale.name: message.editor.toolbar.save.success
locale.en: The toolbar has been successfully saved.

locale.name: message.ajax.licenseKey.delete.error
locale.en: The license key was not deleted because no license key was active in your QUIQQER system.

locale.name: message.ajax.licenseKey.delete.success
locale.en: The license key was deleted successfully and is now inactive.

locale.name: exception.lib.user.activasion.user.is.activated
locale.en: The user could not be activated because he is already activated.

locale.name: projects.project.settings.panel.adminSitemapMax
locale.en: Maximum number of page in the project Sitemap

locale.name: projects.project.settings.panel.mediaSettings.maxUploadSize.description
locale.en: Images that are larger than the specified value are automatically adjusted.

locale.name: projects.project.settings.panel.mediaSettings.watermark.description
locale.en: Note: Changes to the watermark delete the entire media cache.

locale.name: projects.project.site.select.description
locale.en:
Add sitetype adds all pages of the selected sitetypes.
Add site adds a single site.
Add children sites adds all children sites of the selected site. Unles it is a sitetype set. The the sitetype is used as a filter, it will only see all children sites of the selected sitetype.

locale.name: exception.usergroups.search.cannot.search.users.without.parameters
locale.en: The user search cannot be executed without search parameters.

locale.name: quiqqer.settings.general.permissions.description
locale.en:
Use package rights if you want to provide multiple users with different rights.
If no package rights are used, some functions in the system are more powerful.

locale.name: exception.no.permission
locale.en: You have not the necessary rights to perform this action.

locale.name: packages.panel.category.systemcheck.confirm.info
locale.en: Running the system check can take up to 30 seconds. Should the system check really be executed?

locale.name: packages.panel.category.systemcheck.textinfo
locale.en: The displayed information are up to one day old. By running the system check (via the button above), the information is updated.

locale.name: packages.panel.category.systemcheck.loader
locale.en: The system check is running, this can take up to 30 seconds.

locale.name: packages.panel.category.systemcheck.checksum.popupText
locale.en:
Here you will find a list of all the files that this package contains. If files have been changed and these changes do not come from you, you should check the package. The checksum test is based on the local file system.

Legend:

  • OK - The checksums match.
  • Unknown - No checksum file.
  • Modified - Local or online version of the file is not the same as the one on the local file system.
  • Missing - The file is not within the original package and it was created on your filesystem.
  • Additional - The original package contains this file, but it was not found on your local filesystem.

locale.name: packages.panel.category.systemcheck.checksum.error
locale.en: Package integrity check sum could not run.

locale.name: packages.panel.category.systemcheck.checksum.fileNotFound
locale.en: Cache file with check sum result not exist.
